Title: Koh
Plot: As a broadcast of Yukio's location is sent to Koh's base, Logan says he will go save her first rather than let her die to get his revenge, with Koh believing the opposite. Making a deal that Logan will distract Kurohagi when he arrives at Dragon Palace so that he and his men can attack, Koh gives Logan a map with a direct route to Dragon Palace named "Hell Road" due to its history of people going in but dying when they are caught.
